member.name: WICProgressNotification
member.summary: Specifies when the progress notification callback should be called.

member.name: WICProgressNotification.WICProgressNotificationBegin
member.summary: The callback should be called when codec operations begin.

member.name: WICProgressNotification.WICProgressNotificationEnd
member.summary: The callback should be called when codec operations end.

member.name: WICProgressNotification.WICProgressNotificationFrequent
member.summary: The callback should be called frequently to report status.

member.name: WICProgressNotification.WICProgressNotificationAll
member.summary: The callback should be called on all available progress notifications.
